```{python}
course = "Python programming"

type(course)
len(course)
```

```{r}
course_r <- "R programming"

typeof(course_r)
length(course_r)
nchar(course_r)
```

### Slicing

```{python}
course[0]
course[-1]
course[0:3]
course[:3]
course[0:]
course[:]
```

```{r}
substr(course_r, 1, 1)
substr(course_r, 1, 4)
```


### Escape

```{python}
print("python \"programming\' \nis fun")
```

```{r}
cat("R\n is also fun")
```


### Formatted String

```{python}
first = "Kittipos"
last = "Sirivongrungson"

print(f"{first} {last} is {len(first + last)} letter long")
```


```{r}
first <-  "Kittipos"
last <-  "Sirivongrungson"

glue::glue("{first} {last} is {nchar(paste0(first, last))} letter long")
```
